title: Amazon introduces Kiro powers for cleaner, context-aware AI-driven development
description: Amazon Web Services Inc. today introduced a new feature for Kiro, the company’s artificial intelligence-powered agentic coding environment for software developers, adding new “powers” that bring specialized expertise to the tool. These powers, unveiled at the…
